info.name: Circle tiling XOR
info.description: Use mouse in horizontal direction to change circle radius :-)

renderpass.code:
// version with AA, 285 chars - FabriceNeyret2
#define mainImage(O,u)                                    \
    float I = 0., b;                                      \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy, K ;                         \
    for( int N = 5, k = -1; ++k < N*N ; I += b )          \
         K = vec2(k%N,k/N)+.5,                            \
         b = smoothstep( 0., float(N+N)/R.y,              \
                ( iMouse.x < 9. ? .6 : 2.* iMouse.x/R.x ) \
                - length( ( (u+u - R)/R.y /1.6 + .5) *vec2(N) -K ) ), \
         O = mix( O, texture( iChannel0, K/64.), .5*b);   \
   	O = mix( O, vec4(1), abs(mod(I,2.)-1.) )

/*
// FabriceNeyret2
// 217 chars version (getting obfuscated :-) )
// Note that hardcoding N would save ~11
#define mainImage(O,u)                                      \
    int  I = 0, N = 5, k = -1;                              \
    for(vec2 R = iResolution.xy,  K ;                       \
        ++k < N*N;                                          \
        length(((u+u - R)/R.y * .625 + .5)*float(N)-.5-K)   \
        < 2.* iMouse.x/R.x                                  \
          ? O = (O + texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(K),0) )/ 2.,\
            I++ : 0                                         \
       ) K = vec2(k%N,k/N);                                 \
   	O = I%2==0 ? vec4(1) : O
        
*/

/*
// 337 chars - saidwho12
#define mainImage(O,u)							\
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,					\
     	p = (u+u - R)/R.y * 1.25, m = iMouse.xy;			\
    float r = (m.x == 0.) ? .6: m.x/R.x*2., N = 5.;\
    int I = 0;									\
    vec3 c = vec3(0);							\
    											\
    for(float i = 0.; i < N; i++) {				\
        for(float j = 0.; j < N; j++) {			\
            vec2 p = (p*.5+.5)*N - .5-vec2(i,j);\
            float b = length(p)-r;				\
            if(b < 0.) {						\
                I++;							\
                c = mix(c, texelFetch(iChannel0,\
                ivec2(i,j), 0).rgb, .5);		\
            }									\
        }										\
    }											\
   	O.rgb = mix(vec3(1), c, float(I%2==1));
*/
renderpass.name: Image
